product.name: Heavy Duty Light Stand with Caster - 10.5ft/320cm Adjustable Light Stand with Stainless Steel, High Stability and Mobility Light Stand Photography for Strobe Light, Softbox, Reflector
product.description:
We are a manufacturer specializing in the production of photography equipment. We are a team also that pays close attention to product quality and customer experience, and we can directly manage the production to strictly control the quality of our products.
Trrose heavy duty light stand with caster is made of stainless steel, which is durable and will not become brittle over time.
Light stand is also equipped with a spring cushioned design, which can buffer the impact of the sharp drop of the equipment.
Please hold it tightly during transportation to avoid damage to the heavy-duty light stand and to better push the heavy-duty light stand.
The Trrose photography light stand adopts a triangular stable structure, which makes the equipment installed on the light stand more stable.
10.5ft Light Stand Wheels
10.82ft C Stand
Upgrade 10.8ft C Stand
9.2ft Light Stand
3 Packs Swivel Caster
2 Packs Sandbags
product.bullet_points:
• [High Stability Light Stand]: Trrose heavy duty light stand is made from high-quality stainless steel for long-lasting durability and will not become brittle over time. The weight of tripod light stand is 14.37lb/6.52kg. It is used to support various photography equipment and make its more stable and move. Experience the powerful stability of the photography light stand.
• [Max Load Capacity & Spring Cushion]: Max load capacity weight of the light stand photography is 66lb/30kg. Lighting stand with caster is also equipped with an spring cushion design, which can buffer the impact of the sharp drop of the equipment and prevent the equipment from being affected. Whether shooting in the studio, indoors or outdoors, Trrose can meet your shooting needs.
• [High Mobility Tripod Stand with Caster]: To make it easier to move the heavy-duty light stand, we also have 360° swivel casters that allow you to easily move heavy equipment both indoors and outdoors, avoiding dragging and lifting, and the rubber wheels protect the floor from scratches. Trrose light stand with casters use a tread brake to lock and open casters, and locking the casters keeps the light stand stationary and prevents light stand photography from moving.
• [Adjustable Height Tripod Stand]: Photography light stand with caster can meet shooting and lighting needs of different heights, heavy duty light stands supports from the min height 4.46ft to the max height 10.5ft. Trrose light stand folded height 4.1ft, allowing you to invert the tripod light stand photography lay it flat anywhere for efficient transportation and easy portability, heavy duty light stand comes with sponge pads for a stable hand grip when you push the light stand.
• [Light Stand with Caster Kit]：Light stand kit includes 1 × heavy duty light stand; 3 × 360° swivel casters. Trrose light stand with caster supports a variety of applicable products, such as reflectors, monolights, umbrellas, flashes, softboxes, cameras.
